name: random-mock
description: Random-mock is a random variable generator that can generate multidimensional variables with specified distribution or correlation.

scripts.server: cd examples && webpack && concurrently "http-server -a localhost -p 5000" "start http://localhost:5000"
scripts.server:clean: cd examples && webpack && concurrently "http-server -a localhost -p 5001 -c-1" "start http://localhost:5001"

author: Xiaoyu Yang
